title: Alcohol: how much is too much
creator_credit: Quartet Films, West, Frank Gardonyi, Alan Capps, Ingvar Grimsgaard and Lou Lilly
brief_description: An open-minded film which discusses social and physiological effects of alcohol. It is particularly designed for elementary grades. The film considers alcohol through such facts as its abuse as a drug, and its physiological effects on the brain and other parts of the human body. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
